name: Campbell Hausfeld  HU502000AV  Portable  Air Compressors  Electric  ;Portable

reviews.name: Campbell Hausfeld Home and Auto Maintenance 20gal ASME Oil-Free Air Compressor
reviews.reviewText: Runs all of my air tools without any issues. The manufacture does not recommend air cutting tools, but it runs an impact wrench, nailer and a spray gun without any issues. The parts all work well, but I would recommend a different coupler that the one included. They are inexpensive and you can upgrade to a brass coupler. I plan on using this compressor for years to come.
reviews.title: Excellent value for the money

reviews.name: Campbell Hausfeld Home and Auto Maintenance 20gal ASME Oil-Free Air Compressor
reviews.reviewText: Awesome compressor for the buck. Runs my impact gun, air chisel an inflates tires
reviews.title: Works great. Well worth the money

reviews.name: Campbell Hausfeld Home and Auto Maintenance 20gal ASME Oil-Free Air Compressor
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as a gift for my husband. He loves it.
reviews.title: Husband loves it

reviews.name: Campbell Hausfeld Home and Auto Maintenance 20gal ASME Oil-Free Air Compressor
reviews.reviewText: I had this compressor out of the box and set up within fifteen minutes. I then let it run for an hour, then used it to dismantle a non-functioning lawn mower without any adverse incidents.
reviews.title: Excellent Compressor

reviews.name: Campbell Hausfeld Home and Auto Maintenance 20gal ASME Oil-Free Air Compressor
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this Campbell Hausfeld air compressor (also Husky air compressor) the other day and it works great! I am able to find the parts for it (as well as my Husky air compressor) at Campbell Hausfeld or sometimes at walmart. Check out Campbell's site if you can't find parts here for your campbell air compressor or husky air compressor.
reviews.title: Good compressor, great price!
